QuestData.Title: Loa-saur
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari have found a way to bind loa to their beasts giving them impressive and lethal powers.$b$bWe need to put a stop to this.$b$bSearch the Beast Pens for a loa speaker and slay him. You should be able to find them by keeping a look out for their glowing beasts.$b$bWe must not allow these atrocities to continue.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, champion. These beasts are strong enough. We don't need them infused with an angry spirit now do we?
